# Tender Notice: Visual Art Collection Program
### Government of Canada Invitation to Bid

**Title:** Visual Art Collection Program (Various Categories)
**Reference #:** cb-5298-81100714
**Amendment #:** 4
**Solicitation #:** 23-238371
**Publication Date:** May 8, 2023

## Background
The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development’s (DFATD) International Platform Branch is seeking professional services to support the delivery of its programs on an as-needed basis. The identifier of services identified is the management of the Visual Art Collection (VAC) program, comprising some 6,500 works of art worldwide.

## Scope of Work
The contracting party is invited to submit a proposal to secure professional services related to the management of the VAC program, consisting of program administration services and a communications consultant. The services are required on an as-and-when-requested basis for a period of 2 years, with the option to extend for 3 additional 1-year periods.

### Key Tasks
*   Ensure the effective administration and delivery of the VAC program to Canada's missions worldwide.
*   Support the program’s acquisition and circulation of works by Canadian artists.
*   Develop and implement a communication plan for the program and the artworks.

## Eligibility and Assessment Criteria
To be considered for this contract, the bidder must have expertise in program administration and communications. Evaluation of proposals will be based on the bidder’s credentials, as well as their experience in managing artistic programs. The selection process will focus on the combined merits of technical ability and price.

## Important Dates
*   Publication Date: May 8, 2023
*   Tender Closing Deadline: May 31, 2023
*   Expected Contract Start Date: June 15, 2023
*   Expected Contract End Date: May 31, 2025
